meanings.definition: To surpass in willpower or determination.
meanings.sent1: She outwills her fear and bravely faces challenges.
meanings.sent2: He always outwills his competitors in the race.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outwills the big grasshopper in carrying food.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outwills any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The hero's willpower outwills even the strongest villains.

meanings.definition: To outdo in terms of will or determination.
meanings.sent1: Their teamwork outwills individual efforts in achieving success.
meanings.sent2: The student outwills the teacher in solving complex problems.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outwills the birds in gathering nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: His determination outwills any challenge that comes his way.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's will to win outwills any opponent on the field.
